infoCard.headline: Software Development Intern @ Infraspec
infoCard.bio: I am a dedicated Software Engineer proficient with React, Node.js, and Flutter. I'm excited to explore new technologies that can help solve real-world problems. I am a 4th year Computer Science student studying at KLS GIT.
